verses.verse: תִּקְע֨וּ <S%H8628><s%> tik-'U Blow שׁוֹפָ֜ר <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far ye the trumpet בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon, in Zion וְהָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H7321><s%> ve-ha-Ri-'u and sound an alarm בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har mountain קָדְשִׁ֔י <S%H6944><s%> kod-shi in my holy יִרְגְּז֕וּ <S%H7264><s%> yir-ge-Zu tremble כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei let all the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Surely בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> va cometh יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> yom- for the day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Surely קָרֽוֹב׃ <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov. for [it is] nigh at hand

י֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom A day חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Cho-shech of darkness וַאֲפֵלָ֗ה <S%H653><s%> va-'a-fe-Lah, and of gloominess י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom a day עָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan of clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֔ל <S%H6205><s%> va-'a-ra-Fel, and of thick darkness כְּשַׁ֖חַר <S%H7837><s%> ke-Sha-char as the morning פָּרֻ֣שׂ <S%H6566><s%> pa-Rus spread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim; upon the mountains עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am people רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> rav a great וְעָצ֔וּם <S%H6099><s%> ve-'a-Tzum, and a strong כָּמֹ֗הוּ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-hu, like לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor נִֽהְיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> nih-Yah there hath not been מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָ֣עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam, ever וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav after לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sef, the like neither shall be any more עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8141><s%> she-Nei it [even] to the years דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor. generations

לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before אָ֣כְלָה <S%H398><s%> 'A-che-lah devoureth אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, A fire וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav them and behind תְּלַהֵ֣ט <S%H3857><s%> te-la-Het burneth לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <S%H3852><s%> le-ha-Vah; them a flame כְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> ke-gan- [is] as the garden עֵ֨דֶן <S%H5731><s%> 'E-den of Eden הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, before וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav them and behind מִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar wilderness שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah, them a desolate וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- all פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> pe-lei-Tah yea and nothing shall escape לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and nothing הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-ye-tah become לּֽוֹ׃ <S%H99999><s%> lo.

כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'Eh The appearance סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim of horses מַרְאֵ֑הוּ <S%H4758><s%> mar-'E-hu; of them [is] as the appearance וּכְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> u-che-fa-ra-Shim and as horsemen כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יְרוּצֽוּן׃ <S%H7323><s%> ye-ru-Tzun. so shall they run

כְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ke-Kol Like the noise מַרְכָּב֗וֹת <S%H4818><s%> mar-ka-Vot, of chariots עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei on the tops הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim of mountains יְרַקֵּד֔וּן <S%H7540><s%> ye-rak-ke-Dun, shall they leap כְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> ke-kOl like the noise לַ֣הַב <S%H3851><s%> La-hav of a flame אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, of fire אֹכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> 'o-che-Lah that devoureth קָ֑שׁ <S%H7179><s%> Kash; the stubble כְּעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ke-'Am people עָצ֔וּם <S%H6099><s%> 'a-Tzum, as a strong עֱר֖וּךְ <S%H6186><s%> 'e-Ruch array מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah. set in battle

מִפָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav Before their face יָחִ֣ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> ya-Chi-lu shall be much pained עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim; the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nim all faces קִבְּצ֥וּ <S%H6908><s%> kib-be-Tzu shall gather פָארֽוּר׃ <S%H6289><s%> fa-Rur. blackness

כְּגִבּוֹרִ֣ים <S%H1368><s%> ke-gib-bo-Rim like mighty men יְרֻצ֔וּן <S%H7323><s%> ye-ru-Tzun, They shall run כְּאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> ke-'an-Shei every one מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah of war יַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu they shall climb חוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mah; the wall וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish each בִּדְרָכָיו֙ <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chav on his ways יֵֽלֵכ֔וּן <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chun, march וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor יְעַבְּט֖וּן <S%H5670><s%> ye-'ab-be-Tun and they shall not break אֹרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H734><s%> o-re-cho-Tam. their ranks

וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish Neither shall one אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv another לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִדְחָק֔וּן <S%H1766><s%> yid-cha-Kun, thrust גֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Ge-ver every one בִּמְסִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H4546><s%> bim-sil-la-To in his path יֵֽלֵכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chun; march וּבְעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> u-ve-'Ad through הַשֶּׁ֛לַח <S%H7973><s%> hash-She-lach upon the sword יִפֹּ֖לוּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu and [when] they fall לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִבְצָֽעוּ׃ <S%H1214><s%> yiv-Tza-'u. they shall not be wounded

בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir in the city יָשֹׁ֗קּוּ <S%H8264><s%> ya-Shok-ku, They shall run to and fro בַּֽחוֹמָה֙ <S%H2346><s%> ba-cho-Mah upon the wall יְרֻצ֔וּן <S%H7323><s%> ye-ru-Tzun, they shall run בַּבָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> bab-bat-Tim upon the houses יַעֲל֑וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu; they shall climb up בְּעַ֧ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad through הַחַלּוֹנִ֛ים <S%H2474><s%> ha-chal-lo-Nim at the windows יָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u they shall enter in כַּגַּנָּֽב׃ <S%H1590><s%> kag-gan-Nav. like a thief

לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before רָ֣גְזָה <S%H7264><s%> Ra-ge-zah shall quake אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, The earth רָעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> ra-'a-Shu shall tremble שָׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim; them the heavens שֶׁ֤מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> She-mesh the sun וְיָרֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H3394><s%> ve-ya-Re-ach and the moon קָדָ֔רוּ <S%H6937><s%> ka-Da-ru, shall be dark וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> ve-cho-cha-Vim and the stars אָסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> 'a-se-Fu shall withdraw נָגְהָֽם׃ <S%H5051><s%> na-ge-Ham. their shining

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan shall utter קוֹלוֹ֙ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lo his voice לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2426><s%> chei-Lo, army כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Surely רַ֤ב <S%H7227><s%> rav great מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od [is] very מַחֲנֵ֔הוּ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Ne-hu, for his camp כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki is indeed עָצ֖וּם <S%H6099><s%> 'a-Tzum for [he is] strong עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh that executeth דְבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro; his word כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Surely גָד֧וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] great יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> yom- for the day יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God וְנוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> ve-no-Ra terrible מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od and very וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi can יְכִילֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3557><s%> ye-chi-Len-nu. and who can abide

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- even עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- Therefore also now saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD שֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> Shu-vu turn עָדַ֖י <S%H5704><s%> 'a-Dai with בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem; ye [even] to me with all your heart וּבְצ֥וֹם <S%H6685><s%> u-ve-Tzom and with fasting וּבְבְכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> u-ve-ve-Chi and with weeping וּבְמִסְפֵּֽד׃ <S%H4553><s%> u-ve-mis-Ped. and with mourning

וְקִרְע֤וּ <S%H7167><s%> ve-kir-'U And rend לְבַבְכֶם֙ <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem your heart וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- and not בִּגְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H899><s%> big-dei-Chem, and not your garments וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shu-vu and turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for חַנּ֤וּן <S%H2587><s%> chan-Nun for he [is] gracious וְרַחוּם֙ <S%H7349><s%> ve-ra-Chum and merciful ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he אֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> 'E-rech slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> ve-rav- and of great חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed, kindness וְנִחָ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> ve-ni-Cham and repenteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הָרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah. him of the evil

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יוֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' Who knoweth יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv [if] he will return וְנִחָ֑ם <S%H5162><s%> ve-ni-Cham; and repent וְהִשְׁאִ֤יר <S%H7604><s%> ve-hish-'Ir and leave אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav behind בְּרָכָ֔ה <S%H1293><s%> be-ra-Chah, a blessing מִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah him [even] a meat offering וָנֶ֔סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> va-Ne-sech, and a drink offering לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. angels פ Peh

תִּקְע֥וּ <S%H8628><s%> tik-'U Blow שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far the trumpet בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon; in Zion קַדְּשׁוּ־ <S%H6942><s%> kad-de-shu- sanctify צ֖וֹם <S%H6685><s%> Tzom a fast קִרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> kir-'U call עֲצָרָֽה׃ <S%H6116><s%> 'a-tza-Rah. a solemn assembly

אִסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> 'is-fu- Gather עָ֞ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am the people קַדְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H6942><s%> kad-de-Shu sanctify קָהָל֙ <S%H6951><s%> ka-Hal the congregation קִבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> kiv-Tzu assemble זְקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> ze-ke-Nim, the elders אִסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> 'is-Fu gather עֽוֹלָלִ֔ים <S%H5768><s%> o-la-Lim, the children וְיֹנְקֵ֖י <S%H3243><s%> ve-yo-ne-Kei and those that suck שָׁדָ֑יִם <S%H7699><s%> sha-Da-yim; the breasts יֵצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze go forth חָתָן֙ <S%H2860><s%> cha-Tan let the bridegroom מֵֽחֶדְר֔וֹ <S%H2315><s%> me-ched-Ro, of his chamber וְכַלָּ֖ה <S%H3618><s%> ve-chal-Lah and the bride מֵחֻפָּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H2646><s%> me-chup-pa-Tah. out of her closet

בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> bein between הָאוּלָם֙ <S%H197><s%> ha-'u-Lam between the porch וְלַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ve-lam-miz-Be-ach, and the altar יִבְכּוּ֙ <S%H1058><s%> yiv-Ku weep הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, Let the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tei the ministers יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְֽיֹאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-me-Ru and let them say ח֧וּסָה <S%H2347><s%> Chu-sah Spare יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עַמֶּ֗ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha, thy people וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten and give נַחֲלָתְךָ֤ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-te-Cha not thine heritage לְחֶרְפָּה֙ <S%H2781><s%> le-cher-Pah to reproach לִמְשָׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> lim-shol- should rule over בָּ֣ם <S%H99999><s%> bam גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, that the heathen לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru them wherefore should they say בָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> va-'am-Mim, among the people אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. angels
